tool_description: Maps shipping performance across different geographic regions to identify regional strengths and weaknesses.

shipment_data_id.description: Reference ID for previously retrieved shipping data

geographic_granularity.description: Level of geographic detail: state, region, zip_code, or metropolitan_area

error_messages: Invalid shipment data ID: The provided data reference cannot be found or has expired.
Invalid geographic granularity: Use state, region, zip_code, or metropolitan_area.
Insufficient geographic data: Not enough location information available for mapping analysis.
Invalid performance metric: Supported metrics include delivery_time, cost, reliability, damage_rate.
usage: Provide shipment_data_id and choose geographic_granularity. Optionally specify performance_metrics to focus on particular aspects of geographic performance.
